DataSource.Query: SELECT sales.sales.sales_id, sales.sales.invoice_number, sales.price_types.price_type_code, inventory.customers.customer_name, inventory.customers.company_name, account.users.name AS [user], sales.sales.total_amount, sales.sales.total_discount_amount, sales.sales.tender, sales.sales.change FROM sales.sales INNER JOIN inventory.customers ON inventory.customers.customer_id = sales.sales.customer_id INNER JOIN account.users ON account.users.user_id = sales.sales.salesperson_id INNER JOIN sales.price_types ON sales.price_types.price_type_id = sales.sales.price_type_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND account.users.office_id = @OfficeId AND (COALESCE(@CustomerId, 0) = 0 OR sales.sales.customer_id = @CustomerId);

DataSource.Title: Summary by Customer
DataSource.Query: SELECT inventory.customers.customer_name, inventory.customers.company_name, SUM(sales.sales.total_amount) AS total_sales FROM sales.sales INNER JOIN inventory.customers ON inventory.customers.customer_id = sales.sales.customer_id INNER JOIN account.users ON account.users.user_id = sales.sales.salesperson_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND account.users.office_id = @OfficeId AND (COALESCE(@CustomerId, 0) = 0 OR sales.sales.customer_id = @CustomerId) GROUP BY inventory.customers.customer_name, inventory.customers.company_name;
